attributes.action: stop the postive discrimination against knowledge students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please help petition against The Mayor,s postive discrimination against knowledege students. Nobody should be unable to study the knowledge, but also nobody should be given extra help (free bikes, clothing,free knowledge schools) just because of their religion or sex. Everyone should be treated fairly and equally.Why should you be denied a free bike, clothing and tuition, just because of your religion or sex or skin colour.Stop this discrimination now....

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop the postive discrimination against knowledge students."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14628.asp

Prime Minister's Office
